title: Boat S*x & College Party Blackouts ft. Pretty Basic (Remi Cruz & Alisha Marie)
description:
Remi and Alisha of Pretty Basic return to the pod for another wild episode. They take turns being in the host seat to recount Remi’s boat sex escapades and Alisha’s first time blacking out at an Indiana college party week.
Listen to Pretty Basic: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/pretty-basic-with-alisha-marie-and-remi-cruz/id1439655378

As a listener, you’ll get 10% off your first month by visiting our sponsor at https://betterhelp.com/wt9
Join the millions of Americans already loving Chime. Get started today at https://chime.com/WT9
